General.Name: DF Deutsche Forfait AG
General.Description: DF Deutsche Forfait AG, provides foreign trade finance and related services for exporters, importers, and other financial companies in the Middle East and Eastern Europe. It is involved in the collection of foreign trade receivables; forfaiting; and provision of marketing and consulting services. The company also engages in granting of loans, purchase and sale of promissory notes, processing of payment transactions, and debt collection activities. In addition, the company offers project financing and factoring services. It provides its services to food, pharmaceutical, and healthcare industries. DF Deutsche Forfait AG was founded in 2000 and is based in Gruenwald, Germany.
